title: BELLA CASA BY RACHANA LIFESTYLE
detail: Rachana Bella Casa combines elegance and modernity in its 2 and 3 BHK residences. Designed to offer both style and functionality, these homes feature high-quality finishes, contemporary modular kitchens, and efficient climate control systems. Enjoy spacious private balconies, beautifully landscaped gardens, and a range of premium amenities, including a well-appointed clubhouse and a fitness center. Rachana Bella Casa is where modern living meets timeless comfort, providing a refined living experience that caters to your every need.
developer_detail: Rachana is a real estate developer based in India. They specialize in residential and commercial projects, offering high-quality construction and innovative design solutions. With a focus on customer satisfaction and attention to detail, Rachana aims to create spaces that meet the needs and aspirations of their clients. They are known for their commitment to quality, reliability, and timely delivery in the real estate sector.
city_description: Baner-Sus Road, situated in the northwestern part of Pune, is an emerging real estate hotspot known for its serene surroundings, excellent connectivity, and promising growth prospects. This thriving corridor connects the well-established suburb of Baner to the developing area of Sus, offering a blend of urban convenience and tranquil living.
